name: Kelingking Sunset Point Hotel & Spa
address: Jl. Pantai Kelingking, Karang Dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Only if I can give negative ratings, I am utterly disappointed with this hotel! I only booked here because of issues with my previous booking, but let me tell you, it's nothing like the photos depict.

Upon arrival, they didn't bother to ask for my documents, just glanced at my booking and ushered us into some random room, despite booking a deluxe one. And let's talk about that room‚Äîit was a nightmare! We discovered a gecko behind the table, and when we asked the staff to remove it, they responded rudely. After a while, they claimed to have taken care of it, but lo and behold, we found it under the bed! When we called them out again, they behaved aggressively and started ranting in their language. And that's not all‚Äîwe found another one behind the curtain! Each time we asked for help, they mocked us and behaved disgustingly.

The room doors were a joke‚Äîthey were sliding doors that didn't even close properly. And don't get me started on the TV‚Äîit didn't work!

As for the breakfast we booked, it was a joke. Despite the menu boasting numerous options, the manager insisted most items were payable. With the "free" breakfast, we were limited to either an omelet or a banana pancake. As a strict vegetarian, I opted for the pancakes, only to find out they tasted like omelet, clearly cooked in the same pan!

When we complained, the manager made faces and mocked us, saying, "gecko gecko gecko‚Ä¶" as if it was a joke!

This was by far the worst experience of my life. I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy!

The only upside is that Kelingking Beach is a 5-minute walk away.
review 2: Had a great stay at this hotel. Room was nice and clean, location was amazing and beautiful, and the staff were excellent and very helpful. There is also a restaurant and a store to buy snacks and other necessities. The pool was also well maintained, with a great view. Highly recommend this hotel - would definitely have no problem staying here again in Nusa Penida.
review 3:
Overall it was an okay stay. Great location and it‚Äôs very close from the Kelingking Beach. Mattress and AC were also pretty new. Upon checking in, the staff didn‚Äôt check our passports or identity cards, they only told us to write our name on a book. Moreover, the staff asked us repeatedly when we were checking out as if they had no clue about their hotel‚Äôs reservations. It‚Äôs dangerous for a business because whoever can come by and stay in the hotel.

However, we had to check out earlier because I had meeting appointments and the internet connection and electricity were not reliable. WiFi connection was off on our first day (the staff said the whole island was affected but we went to two nearby restaurants and they had WiFi) and there was bad if not, no service around Kelingking area. Every evening there were 2-3 times power outages and the water pump in the bathroom didn‚Äôt work because of that. There were 6 times power outages between 8 AM to 1 PM on the 3rd day we were there and only the AC that was turned on. Nothing was charged and the light was off. So they need to fix this electricity problem.
review 4: I don't recommended to anyone. Rooms are super smelly, if you have allergy or breathing problems avoid staying here. Everything is old, towels are torn and yellowish. Washrooms feel never been deep clean. Consistant power outage.
review 5:
This is a budget hotel. Please dont expect extreme hygiene and service. It is decent enough if you want to just sleep here for the night. There are many nearby hotels but the price is double. You get what you pay for. For me it was a decent stay. Just like no one wears seatbelt and helmets in nusa penida. no one checks identity cards here.

One of the only reason to book this is if you want to visit T-Rex ü¶ñ beach in the morning. Which is why I booked this hotel.

name: Kelingking Bar and Restaurant
address: Dusun / Br, Karang Dawa, Bunga Mekar, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
I like their ambience.
They play top hits new songs.
Grilled fish is a bit hard, but the aroma taste is there. Ended my dinner with a mint choc ice-cream. Yummy üëç
review 2: Having lunch here while having my Penida Tour. Tried their nasi goreng with chicken satay, their satay tastes so good and tender, the peanut sauce also tastes delicious but their nasi goreng has common taste nothing special.
review 3: My wife and I ate lunch here earlier today and had the garden salad, club sandwich and friend noodles. Overall, the food was very mediocre. There were only 2 very small pieces of chicken in the entire fried noodle dish. In fact, in the entire fried noodles, it was just noodle, despite the menu saying there would be some vegetables too. The piece of chicken in the club sandwich was also tiny, but the sandwich was tasty and the fried potatoes with it were good. The lemon dressing for the garden salad was very tasty. However, the service was excellent - quick and friendly. And the restaurant vibe was very nice, perched atop a breezy hill with a nice outdoor patio space. I am not sure that I would ever return and I am not sure what prompted all of these 5 star reviews.
review 4:
The food was decent nothing amazing, but nothing bad either.

The service was bit slow, but the staff were friendly. Overall, it was an okay experience.
review 5:
The drink prefect
Rice ..chicken amazing food you got and service at it‚Äôs best
And your location is amazing with the cool breeze
I love it‚ò∫Ô∏èCan‚Äôt Wait to share with my friends

name: Tatakan Bungalow
address: Jl. Pura Klibun, Karang Dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
My family and I had the most magical 3 nights here! Loved the bungalows, the pool area, the ability to rent scooters and drive around the beautiful Nusa Penida! But the staff absolutely made this trip for us, so helpful and so much fun to be around! Thank you for a brilliant stay!

If you are in the area we would highly recommend trekking down to Klingking beach (even though it is super difficult - wear trainers) and would also recommend a meal at Warung Madeva (5 mins walk away).
review 2:
In the beginning, wanted Kelingking Mesari but all sold out.

Pros:
- This bungalow run by young friendly staffs.
- Environment wise is nice & quiet.
- Total 7 units of bungalows here.
- No mosquitoes

Cons:
Assigned to Rm no.3
- Oily flooring.
- Aircon not cool.
- Look at the desk knob. OMG
- Power supply keeps tripping due to power surge from lightings & aircon. Called reception 2x to rectify. Confronted them if tripped again we insisted on changing to another villa at their cost.
- I took initiative to switch off the lightings since outdoor still bright & sunny. From there on, no tripped. Balanced out power shortage.
- Starting 5am can hear lotsa rooster crowing.
- Door latch not swift & smooth.
- Corroded faucet.
- No cotton slippers.

I would say it‚Äôs a matter of luck which room you are assigned to. More cons than pro. I believed this bungalow used to be tip top condition when it just opened.

I‚Äôm kind enough to rate 3 stars because I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs time to upgrade these bungalows. If u upgrade nicely, surely will attract more tourists demand.
review 3: Hidden gem in nusa! Loved the little huts, but loved the outdoor pool in the middle of the jungle even more. Can swim and see the stars at night. Nusa is a super relaxing island too, wish I stayed here longer
review 4: Food took quite a long time to make, juices watery,  Staff claimed 5% more when paying by card refusing to show any proof of bank charges.  Overall quote rude behaviour.
review 5: The place is at walkable distance to the Kelingking beach, good service, decent swimming pool to wear off the tiredness post trek. They provide pickup/drop services too. We had a great time there.

name: Kelingking mesari villa & spa
address: Jalan Klingking, Karangdawu, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Managed to walk into this villa via its back door. Somehow still spotted & greeted by their staff.

Can‚Äôt judge much about this place bcoz I haven‚Äôt stayed in here before.
Initially wanted this villa but all fully booked.
Must be popular & good.

Besides only a few units villa available. Down side is only its reception is kinda old school makeshift.

Anyway according to them new units will available by next year to cater more guests. Will pay a visit again next year probably :)
review 2:
Very nice place to stay, they are building new houses.
We had no issues, very kind people and the food was great as well !
And 5minutes from Kelingking viewpoint, that was stunning.
review 3:
This place is scary!! I was too afraid to stay there.. No lights on road, very dark and quiet ..

-Hotel is still under construction
-Only 4rooms they have
-pool is great, very deep
-broken toilet cover
-broken door
-electricity gone at night 3.30am
-AC needs time to cool , felt very hot

Overall big NO for families, couples.. just one thing-location is great .. very near to kelingking beach to enjoy sunset.. but apart from this this place seems very scary to me..
review 4:
The place is very dirty, a lot of mold and dust, spider webs, unsanitary bathroom and overall a beat up place. The surrounding area around the pool is dirty and you can see trash laying around(it would take the staff 15 minutes to gather). The place had construction going on, it was very dissapointing to hear and see an entire site going on, not a romantic place at all. You can also hear an ongoing sound of a rooster and pig squeaking every morning through the day. The finishes of the construction are very poor and it isn‚Äôt worth the price we paid for (3 nights, 180‚Ç¨).

The only good thing is the close proximity to Kellyking beach but you have other better options in Nusa Penida.
review 5:
We loved this little wooden house, very close to the famous Kelingking beach that we wanted to visit, so that was a huge bonus for us. The staff was also really nice and helpful. They prepare tasty food for you if you request.
The bathroom needs some sort of ventilation.
The doors needs fixing, you can barely open them, it makes such an unbearable noise.
The rest is great though.

name: Warung Madeva
address: 7F3H+6VR, Bunga Mekar, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
So DERSERVING of its 5-stars rating.

Stopped by for a late lunch at 3pm, had TWO yummy dishes, had a great chat with the owner Asta (sorry if I spelled your name wrong), went hiking and swimming at Kelingking beach, came back for dinner at 6pm.
Asta and his female colleague (sorry I didn't get your name) were so friendly and hospitable and spoke great English.
Food is HOT, yummy and priced so reasonably.
I had the signature dish Ayam Baker (grilled chicken leg with homemade sauce). The grilled tuna was also the best grilled tuna I have had compared to the Philippines and Viet Nam.
Wait time might be a tiny bit long when there are more than 01 guest. And there are mosquitoes. But the quality is worth it.
Local dishes made with care. Skip those tour package restaurants and go here instead!Highly recommended!
review 2: One of the best food we had in Bali! This hidden gem should receive more recognition. The owners couple are very friendly and knowledgeable. A little bit on the downside was that the place located near a busy intersection and probably that‚Äôs why get overlooked often. Would definitely go back here if have a chance
review 3: Best Nasi Goreng I've tasted in Indonesia! The service is amazing. Very lovely people. They cook with their own coconut oil. I ate every day while in the island!
review 4: It's a family owned resturant. They  are super nice and friendly. He explained the menu with passion. The food that his wife made were fresh with amazing taste.
review 5: A 10/10 experience. The service was exceptional, the Grilled Tuna dish was amazing and my husbands spring rolls were beautiful. The salad and sambal that accompanied my grilled tuna were insanely good. Very reasonably priced and the best place I‚Äôve eaten in Nusa Penida

name: Seafood Restaurant & KELINGKING HOSTEL
address: Jl. Pantai Kelingking, Karang Dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Great hotel and great restaurant as well. I stayed there for 2 nights and the dorm was very good : big beds, big lockers and clean bathrooms. I also recommend th√© restaurant with great Food with good price + Nice place to see the sunset, i also add the fact that the staff is Nice and they serve food pretty quickly. Finally its a good place to go to Kelingking beach by foot !
review 2: We stayed here for 3 days and the hostel was amazing. The beds were so comfortable and the is great! Right next to klingking. Good breakfast and you can have dinner at the restaurant too. I do recognize renting a motorbike at the harbor because it‚Äôs hard to get around once you‚Äôre here. I didn‚Äôt see bike rental up here either. The family that runs this place is amazing as well! We loved staying at the place :)
review 3: If you are planning to go to kelingking beach, I would recommend to eat in this restaurant.. we ate vegetables curry and grill fish, I was amazing. Not spicy üå∂ and the fish is great. Staff also friendly. üòá
review 4: The food here is very delicious, there are many choices of menus, the price of course does not drain the contents of the wallet, the staff is friendly and the space is very spacious, very suitable with family.
review 5:
nice and cheap place to stay
2 minutes away from the beach

name: Warung Pengkolan Klingking
address: 7F3J+84Q, Dusun Karang Dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: This little place is wonderful! We went there two days already for breakfast and everything we had was so tasty. We will go there tomorrow again to enjoy our last morning on nusa penida. The lady serving you is super nice always with a kind smile ‚ò∫Ô∏è And the prices are really low for what your getting and you have a nice view to the amazing nature. I can really suggest this place üëçüèºüòç
review 2: Everything was absolutely perfect! Food is homemade and fresh with local and homemade ingredients. The service was excellent and the host was very friendly and kind. The atmosphere was very homey and welcoming.
review 3: Very nice place to eat after the hike. Friendly service and good food
review 4:
Delicious food. Great portions. Amazing prices. Friendly stuff. Went there 3 times. And lots of vegetarian dishes. Would recommend!
Try the Vegetarian Sandwich !
review 5:
This place is amazing. I am a vegetarian but my husband is not, and I swear we literally had the same amount of choices. Every meat option, they make it so it can be non meat too, it's amazing!
Also, the smoothie bowls are downright some of the best I have ever had. The presentation is perfection and the taste is incredible.
Do not miss this place, the menu is large, the food delicious and had no problems with the service at all.
We went for lunch and it was so good we returned the next day for lunch even though it was out of our way because it was just so yummy!

name: Kubu Taman Resto
address: Nusa penida, klingking beach, 7F2G+GWM, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
One of the great and appreciable experience I would like to share.
During my stay in Nusa Penida,I had rented a scooty for visiting all the sight scene in penida with my Girl friend.While we have returning from Klunking beach towards broken beach then suddenly our scooty was gotten breakdown.We were lucky enough that it was happend front of this restaurant.The restaurant owner was so much helpful,he himself was hands down to get repair our scooty and tried to find a mechanic.Unfortunately any near by mechanic was not available and scooty was noy repaired .Later I phoned to our hotel and they picked us.
The restaurant owner is very kind and has a tremendous helping gesture.Also the food is awesome.I had tried their chicken noodles soup.It was great.
review 4: A fantastic culinary journey! Every dish was a masterpiece, and the staff made us feel so welcome. Five stars.

name: KLINGKING SWEET CHILD RESTO
address: 6FXG+QMX pantai klingking beach, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: The cheap food you ordered will be exchanged for expensive ones, and then you will be defrauded of your money, which is of a bad nature. Never come to this restaurant, which is a rubbish restaurant, which will humiliate Indonesia.
review 2: Little girl (propably on a parents command) charged us 80 000 for 2 l of petrol. our mistake - we didnt ask in advance and the prices were intentionally blackened. but everywhere else, even nextdoor basically its 15-20 000 for l. when i tried to argue she gave us 20 000 back with an angry face. I dont know but trying to double charge tourists is something i dont like anywhere. i hate to see it done to tourist in my hometown too.
review 3: Ask you way too much for what they served

name: WARUNG Sea view klingking
address: Dusun Banjar, karang dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: After hiking down to the Klingking beach, which was the beautiful beach I have ever seen, we needed an omlette. We stopped at this Warung, and they have the best Omlette in the whole world. We had two omlettes! Owners and staff are great.
review 2:
Watermelon juice was nice.
But I lost my appetite when she took out her stick to beat a dog. Even when you saw that his ear was already bleeding.
One time I got between her and the dog and warned her that i didn‚Äôt want her to hit the dog. But 5 minutes later she did it again.
I will never come back and I hope nobody will.
review 3: They charged us more then we used and refused to admit their mistake via phone. The fries and fried rice where ok. The rest like calamaris and chickennuggets the quality was bad . It‚Äôs not sure or it‚Äôs from their food, but I was terrible sick that night and next morning. I would not eat there again. It‚Äôs only cash, no pin.
review 4: Cold drinks and good food after to hot walk back up from the beach!
review 5: The worst food I have eaten in the last 20 days of staying in Bali, we understand that it is a tourist place and perhaps it is only planned to be a place to stop by and have something quick, I love Indonesian food but unfortunately the food here place was bad, too seasoned with industrial condiments, instant nudles and clearly the images on the menu in no way correspond to the dishes we received elsewhere. Drinks such as beer are charged at double the price in relation to other restaurants with better services.

name: Warung Mega wangi
address: Unnamed Road, 7F3G+6WJ, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Omg!! Best chicken curry I have EVER had! Some of the more touristy spots should learn from this place. Thank you!!
review 2: Good place to rest after the climb up from the beach
review 3: Nice place to eat, the food is very tasty
review 4: Really good Nasi Goreng and really sweet owners.

name: warung amerta, Mek Luh mangku
address: 7F3H+9XH, Bunga Mekar, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: Warung sabrina
address: 7F3H+7HX, Karang dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: THE LEBAH VILLA & RESTO
address: 7F3H+85W dusun karang dawa, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Fantastic cafe, beautiful breeze looking out over the palm trees. Away from the tourists. Lovely new place, definitely worth the stop!
review 2: Great stop on the way to kelingking beach, breakfast was very nice and cheap! The people were super friendly!
review 3: Amazing food and lovely restaurant. I eat the best cap cay in Bali. Definitely worth it to visit! They have amazing and friendly staffs ‚ù§Ô∏è
review 5: the food is so goodd with a great view

name: Mari Coco Restaurant
address: 7F3J+JW, Bunga Mekar, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Really salty food, small dish for the price. Only fast service.
review 2:
basic
only visited as it was part of the trip

name: Cafe sunset garden
address: 7F3J+3VR, Bunga Mekar, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: KELINGKING PARAMA RESORT
address: 7F4G+M2V, Dusun Penangkidan, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: Palma House Kelingking
address: 7F2G+GWM klingking beach, Bunga Mekar, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
